column4: I've got a problem with an SMP kernel only seeing one CPU core...  it used to work, I don't know what changed...
uname -a shows it's an SMP kernel
WinXP seems to see all four cores.
What version of Ubuntu are you using?  Separate SMP kernels were phased out long ago.
ah, nvm - it does still print SMP in uname, even though that's not in the kernel name now.  Carry on.
